title: TRETORN Women's Loyola Lace Up Sneakers
description: The Tretorn Loyola Sneaker is a classic designer tennis shoe loved by ladies everywhere! This iconic, goes-with-everything style is more unique, comfortable, and durable than your average plain white sneaker. The Tretorn gull wing adds a splash of color and personality to your look, whether you pair them with summer dresses, leggings or business casual wear. What makes Loyola shoes so unique is that for years, they were long loved for playing tennis. Unlike cheaply made fashion sneakers, this is a lightweight, sporty street shoe with enough stability and grip to make it happen on the courts. So, whether you wear your Tretorns to brunch with the girls or a walk along your favorite trail, they're guaranteed to provide long lasting comfort, breathability, and classically fresh style that can' be imitated. This one-of-a-kind lace-up is heads above other sneakers for women thanks to premium, sustainable and locally sourced materials, and years of refining and honing our craft. While the Tretorn Loyola has been popular worldwide since the 1960s, the company itself emerged over 130 years ago in Helsingborg, Sweden. Everything we make - sneakers, boots, outerwear & bags - is designed to withstand the rainy Scandinavian weather while supporting an active lifestyle. Our versatile designs have been loved by celebrities, professional athletes, and sneaker heads for decades, with no stop in sight. Join Tretorn wearers worldwide in sporting fun, stylish athleisure designs that take you everywhere you want to go. - Designed in Sweden, imported, made from 100% locally sourced materials - 100% engineered upper, unlined - Lace-up closure, laces included - Rubber outsole (50% natural gum rubber) - EcoOrtholite insole (sustainably made with recycled material) - Available colors: Black/White, Leopard, Navy/White, White/Navy, White/Snakeskin, White/White, White/Green, White/Red, White/Pink
